projects.description: Random Quote Generator: A random quote is selected from an array of questions using JavaScript. In addition, there is a timer that will automatically refresh the page displaying a new quote with a new background color.
Data Pagination and Filtering: Using JavaScript, this project breaks up 42 students into several pages of 12 students at a time.

Interactive Form: A form created with HTML and logic programmed with Javascript. Form submission is dependent upon filling out the form correctly. Different colors and styles are available depending on your selection under t-shirt field

Phrase Hunter: Do we have any Will Smith movie buffs? This 'hangman' styled game  was created around popular Will Smith movies! Think you have what it takes? With only 5 lives you have to spell out the title of each movie.

Employee Directory App: Using AJAX and Fetch API, this application gathers 12 random users from random.user.me. A picture and several contact details are available to view for each individual student.
